医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现医用大麻法对阿片类药物处方没有影响根据威尔康奈尔医学研究人员的政策分析，允许使用医用大麻的州法律并没有减少阿片类药物或其他慢性非癌症疼痛疗法的处方。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Medical-cannabis-laws-have-no-effect-on-opioid-prescriptions-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Medical-cannabis-laws-have-no-effect-on-opioid-prescriptions-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8182d264-9871-4cf5-b256-bd93ee092a24 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 15:36:00 -0400 Medical cannabis laws have no effect on opioid prescriptions, study finds
研究发现，经常吸食大麻的人更容易出现术后并发症根据 UTHealth Houston 的研究人员今天在《美国医学会杂志》杂志上发表的一项研究，经常吸食大麻的人在手术前、手术期间和手术后出现并发症的风险增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Regular-cannabis-users-more-likely-to-experience-postoperative-complications-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Regular-cannabis-users-more-likely-to-experience-postoperative-complications-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ee46017-333c-4edb-8aca-f31aa0d2e256 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 15:33:24 -0400 Regular cannabis users more likely to experience postoperative complications, study finds
新的血液测试可以诊断胆汁酸腹泻大多数人在一生中的某个阶段都曾遭受过肠道感染或食物中毒，迫使他们呆在靠近浴室的地方。这是非常不舒服的。不过，大多数时候，一切都过去得很快。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/New-blood-test-could-diagnose-bile-acid-diarrea.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/New-blood-test-could-diagnose-bile-acid-diarrea.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df8086dd-659d-4849-8c36-43a206a5815b Wed, 05 Jul 2023 15:20:08 -0400 New blood test could diagnose bile acid diarrhea
研究揭示了一个人如何记住童年虐待或忽视的经历会影响未来的情绪障碍伦敦国王学院和纽约城市大学精神病学、心理学和神经科学研究所 (IoPPN) 今天（7 月 5 日星期三）在《美国医学会杂志精神病学》上发表的新研究发现，童年虐待和/或忽视的记忆和处理方式对以后心理健康的影响比经历本身更大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Study-reveals-how-a-person-remembers-experiences-of-childhood-abuse-or-neglect-can-impact-future-emotional-disorders。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Study-reveals-how-a-person-remembers-experiences-of-childhood-abuse-or-neglect-can-impact-future-emotional-disorders。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64f2682b-242b-4d35-8e8d-288657394049 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 15:12:05 -0400 Study reveals how a person remembers experiences of childhood abuse or neglect can impact future emotional disorders
研究揭示了最常见先天性心脏病的原因二叶式主动脉瓣是人类最常见的先天性缺陷，影响人口的 1% 至 2%。受影响的个体具有两个不对称瓣叶，而不是通常的三个对称瓣叶。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Study-sheds-light-on-cause-of-the-most-common-congenital-heart-defect.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Study-sheds-light-on-cause-of-the-most-common-congenital-heart-defect.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1952825-12d0-4da6-8583-cb021107ff64 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 14:57:00 -0400 Study sheds light on cause of most common congenital heart defect
住院的肯尼亚患者更有可能携带抗生素耐药细菌华盛顿州立大学最近领导的一项研究表明，在该国医院住院超过三天的肯尼亚患者更有可能携带对最广泛使用的抗生素之一产生耐药性的细菌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Hospitalized-Kenyan-病人-more-likely-to-harbor-antibiotic-resistive-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Hospitalized-Kenyan-病人-more-likely-to-harbor-antibiotic-pressive-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33ff9969-33f9-4576-a8c3-600ba19b6164 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 14:54:25 -0400 Hospitalized Kenyan patients more likely to harbor antibiotic-resistant bacteria
使用疫苗增强工程 T 细胞的反应通过改造 T 细胞来摧毁癌细胞，已在治疗某些类型的癌症（例如白血病和淋巴瘤）方面取得了成功。然而，它对于实体瘤的效果并不理想。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Using-a-vaccine-to-boost-the-response-of-engineered-T-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Using-a-vaccine-to-boost-the-response-of-engineered-T-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26ffb1e5-d4c5-4c12-b3c1-d51f9e982107 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 14:30:15 -0400 Using a vaccine to boost the response of engineered T cells
丹麦研究人员解决了丙型肝炎病毒如何逃避免疫系统的难题哥本哈根大学的研究人员通过一种检查病毒样本的新方法解决了丙型肝炎病毒如何避开人体免疫防御的老谜题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Danish-researchers-solve-puzzle-of-how-hepatitis-C-virus-evades-immune-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Danish-researchers-solve-puzzle-of-how-hepatitis-C-virus-evades-immune-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7871f22-5e12-4154-8d3b-a8f20a4b3bfa Wed, 05 Jul 2023 14:26:54 -0400 Danish researchers solve puzzle of how hepatitis C virus evades immune system
鉴定出炎症性肠病的候选基因一项针对高脂肪饮食后小鼠更容易患肠道炎症的基因变异的研究发现了可能导致人类炎症性肠病（IBD）的候选基因。研究结果作为经过审查的预印本发表在 eLife 上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Candidate-genes-for-炎症-bowel-disease-identified.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Candidate-genes-for-炎症-bowel-disease-identified.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d020524c-662c-4851-8e83-10cc52f0ef90 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 14:23:49 -0400 Candidate genes for inflammatory bowel disease identified
研究人员发现谷氨酰胺酶 2 在葡萄糖稳态中的作用谷氨酰胺酶 2 (GLS2) 是谷氨酰胺分解的主要调节因子。 GLS2 将谷氨酰胺转化为谷氨酸，从而在细胞能量生产中发挥作用。 GLS2 在肝脏中含量丰富，在胰腺 β 细胞中也有发现。然而，GLS2 在胰岛（其中存在 ɑ 细胞和 β 细胞）中与葡萄糖代谢相关的作用目前尚不清楚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Researchers-uncover-the-role-of-glutaminase-2-in-glucose-homeostasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Researchers-uncover-the-role-of-glutaminase-2-in-glucose-homeostasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a68ee48b-26b6-4694-a4ce-00b7a68ba43e Wed, 05 Jul 2023 13:43:27 -0400 Researchers uncover the role of glutaminase 2 in glucose homeostasis
